docs.title: ImageJ 顯微影像分析與程式設計課程 (2025)

docs.text: EABIAS EABIAS (East Asia Bioimage Analysts’ Society) is an open and inclusive society for anyone interested in bioimage analysis. Established in 2024, it draws inspiration from the global initiatives of GloBIAS and NEUBIAS , fostering collaboration and innovation in the field. Objectives: Community Building : Connect scientists, engineers, and developers passionate about bioimage analysis. Knowledge Sharing : Provide access to resources, tutorials, and events to empower the bioimaging community. Tool Development : Promote the creation and enhancement of open-source tools and workflows to tackle bioimage analysis challenges. We invite individuals and institutions to join us in advancing bioimage analysis. Contribute your expertise, learn from others, and become part of a growing community dedicated to innovation and discovery. Visit our website for more information and updates on upcoming events.
docs.title: About
